data.route_analysis: Accessibility by plane and bus, local transportation available in cities.
data.pricing_trends: Prices for accommodations spike during Christmas and Easter, average cost of hotels around $50-$100 per night.
data.seasonal_patterns: December and January see the most visitors, while February to March also offers great weather.
data.booking_windows: Best to book 3-6 months in advance for winter vacations, last-minute deals are less common.

destination_insights.route_analysis: Accessibility by plane and bus, local transportation available in cities.
destination_insights.seasonal_patterns: December and January see the most visitors, while February to March also offers great weather.
destination_insights.climate: Temperatures range from 20-25°C (68-77°F), mild and pleasant, suitable for outdoor activities.
destination_insights.culture: Rich indigenous history, colorful markets, and traditional festivals, including Day of the Dead celebrations.
destination_insights.attractions: Tikal National Park, Antigua Guatemala, Lake Atitlán, Semuc Champey.

market_insights.pricing_trends: Prices for accommodations spike during Christmas and Easter, average cost of hotels around $50-$100 per night.
market_insights.booking_windows: Best to book 3-6 months in advance for winter vacations, last-minute deals are less common.
market_insights.demand: High interest in eco-tourism and cultural experiences.
market_insights.competition: Other Central American destinations like Costa Rica and Mexico remain popular alternatives.

trend_insights.market_trends: Increasing interest in sustainable tourism and cultural authenticity.
trend_insights.consumer_behavior: Travelers are looking for personalized experiences rather than traditional package tours.
trend_insights.competitive_landscape: Increasing competition from neighboring countries emphasizing eco-tourism.
trend_insights.seasonal_factors: Winter months attract more travelers from North America seeking warmth.
